name: Greedy shortcode matcher
description: Will match anything within and/or between brackets ([]) or pairs of brackets ([]...[]).
content:
[shortcode]
[shortcode=value]
[shortcode key=value]
[shortcode=value]Text[/shortcode]
[shortcode key1=value1 key2=value2]Text[shortcode]
[this] will match anything within [and between brackets] so may be too greedy for your needs...
author: PEP
